item.title: Why do I Write
item.description: I am already writing in private - notes, scraps, etc. My private writing style only make sense to me, by improving my writing, I would be improving my understanding. I chance upon two articles - “Learning in Public” by swyx https://www.swyx.io/learn-in-public At some point people will start asking you for help because of all the stuff you put out. 80% of developers are “dark”, they dont write or speak or participate in public tech discourse.
